mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT u.u_id, u.u_name, d.d_name, r.r_name, p.pos_name FROM Z_USER u LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_DEPARTMENT d ON(u.d_no = d.d_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_POSITION p ON(u.pos_no = p.pos_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_RANK r ON(u.r_no = r.r_no) ) WHERE (d_name LIKE '%'||#{d_name}||'%' OR d_name IS NULL) AND (pos_name LIKE '%'||#{pos_name}||'%' OR pos_name IS NULL) AND (r_name LIKE '%'||#{r_name}||'%' OR r_name IS NULL) ORDER BY d_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Z_USER VALUES(#{u_no}, #{u_id}, #{u_pass}, #{u_name}, #{u_email}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE Z_USER SET d_no = ( SELECT d_no FROM Z_DEPARTMENT WHERE d_name = NULL ) WHERE d_no = ( SELECT d_no FROM Z_DEPARTMENT WHERE d_name = #{d_name} )
